TopicTitle: Every single bug I found with this airplane

Articles.Content:
I built this small aircraft to do the bridge challenge. Here are all the bugs I encountered:

1. Everytime I close the game and reopen it and load the craft, it deletes the landing gear

2. When I attempt to launch it tries to do the countdown, though it never finishes and I can't skip it so I need to start the engine with the parts manager

3. One time I crashed, a wing flew of, and span in the air, completly unaffected by gravity

4. What you can see in the image: The wing shape didn't load properly and the rudder didn't load in at all. Also the kerbal is bald

5. The first time I flew it, the game crashed my gpu when I minimized the game

6. SAS is all over the place and it wobbles the plane up and down

7. In the VAB, oftentimes the symetry pats appear purple until placed

8. (Not really related to the plane but still putting it here) I cannot start KSP2 from Steam. It says there is some file missing dunno which one. I need to start the exe in the files to even be able to play the game

 

Specs:

Ryzen 7 Pro

GTX 1650

16 GB RAM
